oai_dc:dc.dc:title: PRELIDA - Analysis of the limitations of digital preservation solutions for preserving linked data
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Antoniou, Grigoris
Batsakis, Sotiris
Isaac, Antoine
Scharnhorst, Andrea
Giaretta, David
Meghini, Carlo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Digital Preservation
Linked Data
Gap Analysis
Preservation of Linked Data
info:eu-repo/classification/acm/H.3.7 Digital Libraries
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This deliverable deals with the task of identifying technical issues where this gap exists and the implication of this for efficient digital preservation of linked data.This can be considered as the first step towards describing a roadmap that will bridge this gap and will lead to efficient digital preservation of linked data.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: PRELIDA - Preserving Linked Data. Deliverable D4.1, 2014.
